binaryClass 1.0.0
  • Reference

Binary Classification Model Selection and Evaluation

Source: R/binaryClass-package.R
binaryClass.Rd

The binaryClass package provides a comprehensive toolkit for binary classification tasks in R. It implements powerful functions for model training, evaluation, and prediction, with a focus on comparing different classification approaches.

Key Functions

  • OptimalModelSearch: Automatically compares multiple binary classification models and selects the best model based on AUC, Accuracy, or AIC

  • extract_best_model: Extracts the best model from OptimalModelSearch results for further use

  • compare_model_rocs: Compare ROC curves for different models

  • plot_model_rocs: Plot ROC curves from model results

  • plot_model_cm: Plot confusion matrix from model results

  • plot_descrip: Create descriptive visualizations for binary classification datasets

See also
